original_text: And Machir took a wife for Huppim and for Shuppim. The name of his sister was Maacah. And the name of the second was Zelophehad, and Zelophehad had daughters.
korean_text: 마길은 ?빔과 숩빔의 누이 마아가라 하는 이에게 장가 들었더라 므낫세의 둘째 아들의 이름은 슬로브핫이니 슬로브핫은 딸들만 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: And Machir took a wife for Huppim and for Shuppim.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마길은 훕핌과 숩핌을 위해 아내를 맞이하였다.

sentences.original_text: The name of his sister was Maacah.
And the name of the second was Zelophehad
